reviewText: Absolutely Beautiful!  I love these Confluence films productions.  Very similar to their previous films, if you love fly fishing in beautiful locations, well worth the purchase.
Great cinematography. These films keep improving in quality. Recommended for those interested in fly fishing. Trailer is helpful in determining if this is right for a given individual.
I have purchased this film along with the others made by these film producers and I highly recommend there films. The films are full of beautiful fish species caught all over the world.

Beautiful images, beautiful places and, of course, lots of quality fish porn. This is a great film that will keep your attention with the imagery and interesting stories being told. Can't wait for the next one.

If you are into the panoramic, slow motion, and awesome scenery of the world, then this is what you are looking for.  I have watched it a couple times and it is a fun escape when winter is in full blast.  I recommend flopping in the recliner with a fishing rod and kick back to enjoy some quality fish p0rn.
